trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat is ready to return to Havli.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_TODO_00<tab>Hand the jug of three-year-old premium mezcal to Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_TODO_03<tab>/cheer on Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Mablu.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_001<tab>Master Gobli's praise makes me confident I can be a peddler after all... Well, a bit more confident than before, at least!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_GOBLI_000_002<tab>I'm satisfied with our trade, and I trust you are too. Should you have need of more mezcal, you know who to come to!

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_003<tab>Even at the palace, I don't think I've held a ten thousand pel jug of anything before. My hands won't stop shaking... Here, you'd better hold on to it until we get to the saddlemaker.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_004<tab>Ahahaha! Can you imagine if we dropped it and had to start all over again?
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_005<tab>Luckily, Havli's place is not far─we just need to head across the plaza!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_007<tab>The Third Promise looks ready to trade the mezcal now!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_000_008<tab>My price is final. Bring me a jug of <var 1A 02 /var>premium<var 1A 01 /var> mezcal, or go bargain with another saddlemaker.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_009<tab>This is it─the trade we've been working towards!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>Phew, still in one piece... Right, time to make our deal!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_011<tab>Get your tools ready, saddler─we've brought your precious mezcal!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_000_012<tab>Wait, you actually got your hands on a jug? But you had nothing─a few measly clumps of wool...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_013<tab>What we had was an aspiring trader with a gift for negotiation.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_000_014<tab>Although I'd sooner aid no claimant but Zoraal Ja, I cannot go against the guiding principles of the Pelupelu.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_000_015<tab>The trade is a fair one. I will craft your saddle, Third Promise.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_016<tab>Great!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_000_017<tab>Stay and wait if you like. I have all the requisite materials, so this won't take long.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_000_018<tab>...Your commission is ready. Catching a wild alpaca is never a simple affair, but you'll have an easier time of it with one of my saddles.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_000_019<tab>Now, if you don't mind, I have other work that needs finishing. Ah, I can taste that smooth mezcal already...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>We did it! The saddle is ours!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>And to think we started out with only a hundred-pel basket of alpaca wool... Mablu, you are going to be an incredible merchant!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_022<tab>Thank you! It makes me so glad to hear you say that, Third Promise!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>We got what we came for, so let's return to the ranch! The others will be waiting.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>Success! You traded a ten thousand pel jug of premium mezcal for a taming saddle!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_026<tab>It looks like everyone's been pitching in with the alpacas!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_027<tab>Let's tell them the good news!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_KRILE_000_028<tab>Tobli and Erenville have been teaching us how to care for alpacas. One gentle girl ate the feed straight from my hand!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ERENVILLE_000_029<tab>You've been away for some time. I assume trading was productive?
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALISAIE_100_029<tab>I made the mistake of startling one and caught a glob of spittle for my trouble. I'm beginning to understand Wuk Lamat's aversion to the animals...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_HAVLI_200_029<tab>So that was the Third Promise. She's not the spoiled, untested daughter I was expecting...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>You've acquired the saddle, then?
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_031<tab>Yes, and thanks in no small part to Mablu!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_032<tab>Before you rush off to catch an alpaca, though, let me teach you how to saddle one. I'll bring out one of our wild-born friends so you can practice!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>I know, I know. This is something I need to learn.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_034<tab>Great sunken gods, I did it!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ERENVILLE_000_035<tab>He hardly seemed bothered, much less inclined to spit. As if he was completely accepting of Wuk Lamat's touch...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_036<tab>That is because of the singular scent with which the saddle has been coated. Alpacas find it very soothing.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_037<tab>You know, I've never taken a good, long look at one of you before, but...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_038<tab>You're actually kind of cute.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_039<tab>Ahahaha, you're only now noticing that!?
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_KRILE_000_040<tab>Zoraal Ja! He's back.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>Having done exactly what he set out to do...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>That alpaca he's brought... Is it just me or is it...glowing?

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ERENVILLE_000_043<tab>I've heard tales of such a beast. They say the golden alpaca lives a solitary existence deep in the valley, where it shuns the company of both man and its own kind.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_044<tab>How did he manage to snare a prize like that?

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SAREELJA_000_045<tab>A beast knows its betters. Faced with overwhelming strength, it will yield rather than risk death. An apt illustration of how greatly the power of the First Promise exceeds yours, Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_046<tab>Strength alone won't win him our father's throne. I'll be the one to find the golden city, and then Tural can remain at peace.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ZORAALJA_000_047<tab>An everlasting desire for peace can only be forged in the fires of war.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ZORAALJA_000_048<tab>To unite as one, the people must be taught. They must suffer the horror and the hopelessness firsthand.

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SAREELJA_000_049<tab>Exhaustion from prolonged conflict. The wages of war's merciless nature. These are what moved the clans to join in the founding of Tuliyollal all those years ago.

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SAREELJA_000_050<tab>Consider the younger generation of this village. Since birth have they basked in unbroken harmony, and behold: they regard war not as tragedy but <var 1A 02 /var>opportunity<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SAREELJA_000_051<tab>Thus does the Resilient Son seek to provide education. He offers much-needed lessons in the realities of conquest and a renewed appreciation for peacetime.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALPHINAUD_000_052<tab>'Tis true that war's misery breeds a longing for peace.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>But I have seen with my own eyes what becomes of an empire forged through the violence you propose─the rebellions it spawned, and the ruins it left behind.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ZORAALJA_000_054<tab>The Garlean Empire was a congregation of simpletons.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ZORAALJA_000_055<tab>The oppressed fought back against their oppressors. As well they should.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ZORAALJA_000_056<tab>Men are not beasts. Only a fool would seek to rule over all with the threat of force alone.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SAREELJA_000_057<tab>This is why Gulool Ja Ja did not elevate the Mamool Ja; why he treated all clans with equal respect.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SAREELJA_000_058<tab>However!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SAREELJA_000_059<tab>The First Promise has his gaze fixed upon more distant horizons! He would unite not only Tuliyollal, but the star in its entirety!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_060<tab>What? Why?
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ZORAALJA_000_061<tab>I need not explain myself to you.

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_TOBLI_000_062<tab>Oh, well done! Well done, indeed! The First Promise has completed the Feat of Gold with an appropriately golden flourish! May I present to you your much-deserved keystone!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_063<tab>He's always been like that─never sharing his innermost thoughts with me or even with Koana.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_064<tab>It's like we're not even family...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_066<tab>I could never agree with Zoraal Ja. I want Tuliyollal to be a land of peace, now and always.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_KRILE_000_067<tab>Zoraal Ja is willing to go to war for his twisted vision of peace. But should he achieve this peace, then what...?
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ERENVILLE_000_068<tab>A golden alpaca in the flesh... Like the golden city, I thought them a children's tale.

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALPHINAUD_000_069<tab>So much of our star has begun to embrace reconciliation and rebuild...and this would-be warlord would thrust us all back into turmoil. We cannot allow it to happen.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>What kind of idiot thinks the world can be united with war? Even most Garleans have since realized that their conquests were a mistake.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SYSTEM_100_070<tab>The alpaca seems glum. Perhaps it is wistful for the soothing scent of the taming saddle...
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_071<tab>I'll ponder Zoraal Ja and his mysteries later. Right now, I need to think about finishing the Feat of Gold!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_100_071<tab>I have my saddle, I've practiced how to use it, so lead on to where the wild alpacas roam!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_072<tab>The valley of Oruncanca is northwest of here. Come on, everyone─even if we can't enter ourselves, we can see Wuk Lamat off on her hunt!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_074<tab>Oruncanca is a steep and treacherous place, so only those with the head ledger's blessing are permitted to go there.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_KRILE_000_075<tab>Mablu's right. The least we can do is let Wuk Lamat know we're <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for her!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ERENVILLE_000_076<tab>I've never set foot beyond this point. The valley is said to be home to fiends far more ferocious than spitting alpacas.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALPHINAUD_000_077<tab>How deep do you think the valley is? I glanced over the edge on the way here, but the mist was too thick to even speculate.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALISAIE_000_078<tab>Zoraal Ja may have caught his alpaca first, but that doesn't mean Wuk Lamat is out of the running. She can do this.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_100_79<tab>I can do this... I know I can...

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SYSTEM_000_079<tab><var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on Wuk Lamat as she marshals her courage to attempt the harrowing task of capturing a wild alpaca.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_200_79<tab>What are you doing...?

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_SYSTEM_300_079<tab>Your chosen method of support has confused Wuk Lamat. Perhaps a tried-and-true <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will prove more effective.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_WUKLAMAT_000_080<tab>Thanks to Alphinaud and his healing hands, I can actually stand again...maybe even walk!

TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_KRILE_000_081<tab>We were out here for quite some time, but I'm glad Wuk Lamat was able to catch her alpaca. And Erenville choosing to share his story with us was a welcome surprise!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ERENVILLE_000_082<tab>...I spoke too much. If Wuk Lamat is up to it, we should be heading back to Tobli.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>Wuk Lamat had no serious injuries to speak of. However, she had clearly been pushed to the very limits of her endurance.
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>Alphinaud was quick to lend a hand with dismantling the tent. Is this to be his new obsession now that he's mastered collecting firewood...?
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_085<tab>I'm so relieved the Third Promise came back to us safely!
TEXT_KINGMA117_04876_MABLU_000_086<tab>And the alpaca she tamed is a healthy-looking beast. Surely this will be enough to satisfy the Feat of Gold!
